name: Proportionate Response (Jam Game)
description:
A top-down space shooter where you get stronger the more enemies that are on screen. Your ship has multiple weapons and each fires faster the more enemies of the matching type are on screen. Balance making sure they do not overwhelm you while making sure you have the firepower to take down the boss.

Your ship will automatically fire at the cursor whenever it can. Use the arrow keys or WASD to move around.

Made in Godot for the GMTK Jam 2021 in 27 hours.
